may not explain it 100% correct  so experts correct me if I am wrong.. naked short mean you sell something that you don't have at all.. in SunMoon case  they get into problem the next day coz cannot buy back to cover their position.. borrow script  mean you borrow SunMoon shares from either broker or SGX to sell in the market  you are 'renting' the SunMoon share in this case  until you return the scripts..

2) If you have shorted the stock and could not buy it back on the same day  SGX will buy back your shares at trade date +2. If there is enough script for them to borrow  the buying back will be automatic but always two bids higher(which is to your disadvantage). If there isn't enough script to borrow  penalty will be charged.actually for this  nothing to borrow. buy-in is for existing shareholders with free shares in CDP to sell to u to cover back the shortfall.
